title: Loft apartment off downtown Clevleand
posting_body: This is a newly constructed UNFURNISHED loft on the second floor with a separate private entrance.
Located at 4533 Payne Avenue, Cleveland, Ohio, half way between downtown Cleveland and the Cleveland Clinic/CASE University.
All new appliances and in fact all new construction just completed in June, 2017.
1,700 sq ft. and a 250 sq ft deck with year round grill (gas fired) right off the bedroom.
Open space with eight over head skylights set in a twelve foot high ceiling provides a glorious light that is enhanced with full, natural oak floors.
There are no buildings of comparable height within a block of the complex which allows for even more natural light and an additional feeling of openness.
It overlooks a large sculpture garden and has a 250 sq.ft.
deck in the rear which is right off the bedroom.
Very large bedroom which includes a walk-in closet with ample cabinets and storage space.
One bathroom with large walk-in shower and more cabinets for linens and storage.
The bathroom holds a full sized stacked washer and dryer.
There is an office between the kitchen and bathroom that could be a second bedroom.
It has a builtin desk work area; the backside of the free standing closet.
The openness of the space allows for almost any configuration.
Heat is a European wall furnace with wall mounted Italians radiators that utilize forced hot water and hot water on demand.
This is supplemented with an LG mini split system that supplies added heat during the cold months and provides AC during the summer months.
The kitchen includes maple cabinets with stained glass doors on the uppers.
All new stainless appliances to include gas cooktop, builtin oven and microwave, double bowl stainless sink with commercial disposal.
Black granite countertops that includes an additional informal dinning area on the island.
A separate dinning area on one side of the front space and an adjacent living/recreational area on other side.
Internet access and/or cable TV is offered by either Spectrum or ATT (fiber has been installed) which are tenants responsibility.
The loft has it's own security system that includes an outdoor perimeter.
Large secure off street parking with room for two cars and key fob controlled auto gate.
This area is extremely safe as it has become incorporated into the outer boundary of Cleveland State  and Asiatown.
The side streets are single family homes and the main streets a mix of residential/light industrial.
Once a thriving part of Cleveland's gilded past it is, as is the rest of the city, transiting to a service economy.
Think the Cleveland Clinic, CASE University and the emerging urban campus of Cleveland State University.
Going down Payne towards downtown Cleveland one Asian restaurant (and Asian market) after the other beckons you to fabulous cooking with heartfelt service.
New Dave's located conveniently at Chester and 57th Street.
There is a separate very secure, private entrance way.
$1900/month plus utilities.
Security deposit (one months rent).
Credit check, references and pet security deposit required.
Available 01 August 2022.
